Class RestTestClientBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.general.common.RestTestClientBuilder

  • public class RestTestClientBuilder
extends Object
    This class contains a method to aid simulating a REST client.

    • Method Detail

      • build

        public <T extends RestService> T build(Class<T> clazz)
        This method creates a proxy for the specified RestService interface. Properties server.rest.test.user and server.rest.test.password are used by default for authentication.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The generic type for which a proxy must be created.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The interface specifying the generic type.
        Returns:
        a proxy of the specified type.

      • build

        public <T extends RestService> T build(Class<T> clazz,
                              String login)
        This method creates a proxy for the specified RestService interface. The provided String login is used as both username and password for authentication. The method setLocalServerPort MUST be called in advance. The method setLocalServerPort MUST be called in advance.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The generic type for which a proxy must be created.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The interface specifying the generic type.
        login - the String used as for authentcation.
        Returns:
        a proxy of the specified type.

      • build

        public <T extends RestService> T build(Class<T> clazz,
                              String userName,
                              String tmpPassword,
                              String tmpUrl)
        This method returns an instance of an implementation the specified clazz (which should be a REST service interface, e.g. TablemanagementRestService.class).
        The caller must take care that no parameter value is equal to NULL.
        The caller will be authenticated using basic authentication with the provided credentials. The method setLocalServerPort MUST be called in advance.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The return type.
        Parameters:
        clazz - This must be an interface type.
        userName - The userName for basic authentication.
        tmpPassword - The password for basic authentication.
        tmpUrl - The URL through which the server is reached.
        Returns:
        A REST proxy of type T
